alert.note: Alert for Arches, Grand Flat; Eastern Uinta Basin (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued April 06 at 8:53AM MDT until April 07 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 AM MDT THURSDAY... ...FREEZE WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 9 AM MDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 25 expected. * WHERE...In Utah, Eastern Uinta Basin and Arches/Grand Flat. In Colorado, Grand Valley. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 9 AM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Arches, Grand Flat; Eastern Uinta Basin
